dict.string: He will fight with Hardened armors and swords and his own body.
Super-strength Increase damage you deal with STR skills.
Forest residents to hunting in the well-honed sense. They are also in this war for the crisis of the world.
Smell tracking increase chance to encounter treasure.
They fights with the knowledge of spells and the power of their mind. He has shield spell for the defense.
She was devoted her life to God. She embodies works of God with her faith.
Refuge Reduce damage when you have less HP than MaxHP
No one knows where he came from and his purpose. And no one wants to provoke him.
Berserker When your HP is below 20%, all skills cooldown becomes 0.
She fight at the expense of her own life. Bloods is weapons and armors for her.
Firststrike Chance to reduce cooldown (-1) on encounter.
These heretics have been despised as "cursed blood". In fact, they are not cursed and forced to do dirty work and discriminated.
Avoid Trap You can avoid traps.
The successor of a secret art that's passed down in the East.
Ascetic Each negative state will provide you with damage reduction
She has been seen in our town. Now She can not be seen in our town.
She came from far away, are followers of the Bushido. Her homeland was feared by their strength.
He lives hidden in the outback of the forest. He draws natural power from forests.
They had destroyed some pagans. In front of the crisis of the world, Differences of religion became a trivial problem.
He is dragon-half. He is respect for pride than life as a warrior.
She spent for life and property of others. Crimes and punishments will be forgotten after she die.
A seafaring warrior from savage tribe that were brimming with rage.His endurace is uncanny.
A fairy that lives hidden in the forest.
A servant of God who risks her life on the battlefield.These women believe they can find God within the smell of blood.
The apostles of the gods on earth. They have part of the power of God.
